sentences.en: After taking off, the stewardess will send you some coffee, or beverage.
sentences.cn: 起飞后, 空中小姐会给你送来咖啡或饮料.

sentences.en: Could I speak to a stewardess that understands Chinese?
sentences.cn: 我能找一位懂中文的空中小姐说话 吗 ?

sentences.en: If you need the stewardess for anything, just push the call button.
sentences.cn: 如果您有事要找空中小姐, 就按这个叫人按钮.

sentences.en: If you need the stewardess for anything, you can press the button.
sentences.cn: 如果你有事要叫空中小姐, 你可以按这个钮.

sentences.en: If you want the stewardess for anything, just push the call button.
sentences.cn: 如果您有事要找空中小姐, 就按这个唤人按钮.

sentences.en: Only the stewardess can go from the cabin to the cockpit.
sentences.cn: 只有空中小姐才能从乘客座舱进入驾驶员座舱.

sentences.en: Please show your ticket to the stewardess when you board the plane.
sentences.cn: 登机时请向空中小姐出示机票.

sentences.en: So you would like to become a stewardess, is that right?
sentences.cn: 你愿意当一名空中小姐, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Stewardess : You're welcome. Would you like anything to drink?
sentences.cn: 很乐意为您效劳. 要来点喝的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Thank you , Stewardess . Could you direct me to my seat?
sentences.cn: 谢谢, 能带我到座位上去 吗 ?

sentences.en: The stewardess happened to be an old friend of mine.
sentences.cn: 那位空中小姐碰巧是我的老友.

sentences.en: The stewardess has just announced the next stop in English.
sentences.cn: 乘务员刚刚用英语报站.

sentences.en: The stewardess hurried the passengers onto the plane.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐催乘客赶快登机.

sentences.en: The stewardess kindly brought me a blanket.
sentences.cn: 女乘务员体贴地给我拿来了毯子。

sentences.en: The stewardess will get you some water from the galley.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐会从厨房给你拿些水来.

sentences.en: When I asked the solitary stewardess if she could clean the floor so I could place my purse on it, she said flippantly, “Oh, I’m not going to clean it, what can I tell you, it’s a plane.
sentences.cn: 当我问及那个仅有的服务员，是否可以把地板擦一擦好让我能发一下包时。 她毫不礼貌的说：“嗷，我不打算那么做，我得告诉你这是在飞机上。
